com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers

Class ArpeggiateModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers.ArpeggiateModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MIDINoteModifier, Modifier

    public class ArpeggiateModifier
extends Object
implements MIDINoteModifier
    Class ArpeggiateModifier modifies the note's start beat by the amount and operation. The duration of each note is the given duration minus its start beat.

    Beats are 1 based. If the pattern size is smaller than the track size, it will wrap. 

     Chord chord = ChordFactory.getChordByFullSymbol("Cmaj7");
     MIDITrack track = chord.createMIDITrack();
     double startBeat = 1d;
     double duration = 4d;
     double gap = .25;
     ArpeggiateModifier mod = new ArpeggiateModifier(startBeat, duration, gap);
     track.map(mod);
 
     // or
     List<Double> series = new ArrayList<>();
     series.add(.25d);
     series.add(.5d);
     series.add(1d);
     track.map(new ArpeggiateModifier(startBeat, duration, series,
             Modifier.Operation.ADD));
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa
    See Also:
    Modifier, Modifier.Operation, MIDINoteModifier, MIDITrack.map(MIDINoteModifier)
